stories.Title: A breakthrough in molecular discovery
stories.Description: MIT researchers have proven that predicting molecular properties and generating viable molecules can be achieved with a small, domain-specific dataset, and the right machine-learning techniques.
stories.Tweet: A breakthrough in molecular discovery 📦 MIT researchers have proven that predicting molecular properties and generating viable molecules can be achieved with a small, domain-specific dataset, and the right machine-learning techniques. #ai https://phys.org/news/2023-07-ai-small-amount-molecular-properties.html

stories.Title: GPT-4 goes public
stories.Description: OpenAI has made GPT-4 available to developers through the API. Users can now access advanced capabilities for creating innovative applications.
stories.Tweet: GPT-4 goes public 📦 OpenAI has made GPT-4 available to developers through the API. Users can now access advanced capabilities for creating innovative applications. #openai https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/06/openai-makes-gpt-4-generally-available/

stories.Title: Alibaba's latest AI innovation
stories.Description: Meet Tongyi Wanxiang, an AI tool that can generate images in different styles from prompts in Chinese and English, opening up new possibilities for creative minds.
stories.Tweet: Alibaba's latest AI innovation 📦 Meet Tongyi Wanxiang, an AI tool that can generate images in different styles from prompts in Chinese and English, opening up new possibilities for creative minds. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/07/07/alibaba-launches-ai-tool-to-generate-images-from-text-.html

stories.Title: Amazon’s approach to the AI race
stories.Description: CEO Andy Jassy addresses perceptions of Amazon lagging in AI and emphasizes the company's commitment to investing in this transformative technology.
stories.Tweet: Amazon’s approach to the AI race 📦 CEO Andy Jassy addresses perceptions of Amazon lagging in AI and emphasizes the company's commitment to investing in this transformative technology. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/07/06/amazon-ceo-explains-how-the-company-will-compete-in-ai-race-.html

stories.Title: Navigating a crowded space
stories.Description: The surge in Starlink's collision-avoidance maneuvers is causing concern, with numbers doubling in just six months. Experts warn of potential difficulties in managing the safety of orbital operations.
stories.Tweet: Navigating a crowded space 📦 The surge in Starlink's collision-avoidance maneuvers is causing concern, with numbers doubling in just six months. Experts warn of potential difficulties in managing the safety of orbital operations. #spacex https://www.space.com/starlink-satellite-conjunction-increase-threatens-space-sustainability

stories.Title: SpaceX lends a helping hand to Europe
stories.Description: With Ariane 5 retired, Ariane 6 delayed, and other rockets grounded, European missions are increasingly relying on SpaceX's Falcon 9, as they work toward restoring their launch capabilities.
stories.Tweet: SpaceX lends a helping hand to Europe 📦 With Ariane 5 retired, Ariane 6 delayed, and other rockets grounded, European missions are increasingly relying on SpaceX's Falcon 9, as they work toward restoring their launch capabilities. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/europe-leans-on-spacex-to-bridge-launcher-gap/

stories.Title: India's lunar venture
stories.Description: On July 14, they aim to launch Chandrayaan-3, attempting to make a controlled landing on the Moon. If successful, India will join an exclusive club of nations achieving this remarkable feat.
stories.Tweet: India's lunar venture 📦 On July 14, they aim to launch Chandrayaan-3, attempting to make a controlled landing on the Moon. If successful, India will join an exclusive club of nations achieving this remarkable feat. #rocketscience https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02217-0

stories.Title: Vision Pro: A tailor-made experience
stories.Description: Apple takes a unique approach to the launch of the Vision Pro. Customers will schedule appointments at select Apple stores to purchase and try on the headset.
stories.Tweet: Vision Pro: A tailor-made experience 📦 Apple takes a unique approach to the launch of the Vision Pro. Customers will schedule appointments at select Apple stores to purchase and try on the headset. #apple https://www.theverge.com/2023/7/7/23786865/apple-vision-pro-headset-store-retail-face-scan

stories.Title: A supermassive discovery
stories.Description: The James Webb Space Telescope has revealed an ancient supermassive black hole in the galaxy CEERS 1019, challenging conventional theories with its smaller size and early formation.
stories.Tweet: A supermassive discovery 📦 The James Webb Space Telescope has revealed an ancient supermassive black hole in the galaxy CEERS 1019, challenging conventional theories with its smaller size and early formation. #space https://www.space.com/james-webb-space-telescope-most-distant-supermassive-black-hole

stories.Title: Mercedes hops on the NACS bandwagon
stories.Description: Mercedes-Benz has confirmed the integration of Tesla's NACS connector in its North American electric vehicles, joining the growing list of automakers adopting this industry-standard charging solution.
stories.Tweet: Mercedes hops on the NACS bandwagon 📦 Mercedes-Benz has confirmed the integration of Tesla's NACS connector in its North American electric vehicles, joining the growing list of automakers adopting this industry-standard charging solution. #mercedesbenz https://electrek.co/2023/07/07/mercedes-benz-adopts-tesla-nacs/

stories.Title: Beware of the thread
stories.Description: Deleting your Threads profile comes with a catch, as it will also delete your entire Instagram account. Meta is working on solutions to allow independent account deletion.
stories.Tweet: Beware of the thread 📦 Deleting your Threads profile comes with a catch, as it will also delete your entire Instagram account. Meta is working on solutions to allow independent account deletion. #instagram https://www.engadget.com/meta-is-working-to-stop-deleted-threads-accounts-from-nuking-instagram-too-094423213.html
